net.cloud.gfx.elements

Class PasswordField.DisplayablePasswordText

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.gfx.elements.TextField.DisplayableText
      • net.cloud.gfx.elements.PasswordField.DisplayablePasswordText
  • Enclosing class:
    PasswordField

    class PasswordField.DisplayablePasswordText
extends TextField.DisplayableText
    Almost identical to the super class DisplayableText but will instead display asterisks rather than the normal text. There will be the same number of asterisks as plain text, with the different sizing taken care of.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.cloud.gfx.elements.TextField.DisplayableText

        displayed, hintLeft, leftIdx, rightIdx

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisplayablePasswordText()
      Create new displayable text on the premise the text field starts blank

    • Method Detail

      • updateDisplay

        protected void updateDisplay(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Figure out what text should be displayed. Upon completion, the displayText will have its text and indices changed to reflect what should currently be drawn into the field.
        Overrides:
        updateDisplay in class TextField.DisplayableText
        Parameters:
        g2d - The graphics object currently being used for drawing

      • determineRightwise

        protected void determineRightwise(java.awt.FontMetrics metrics)
        Update the display by maintaining the right index and showing as much text as possible moving right to left. The display field members are changed, the glyph vector is not invalidated.
        Overrides:
        determineRightwise in class TextField.DisplayableText
        Parameters:
        metrics - A FontMetrics object to measure text with

      • determineLeftwise

        protected void determineLeftwise(java.awt.FontMetrics metrics)
        Update the display by maintaining the left index and showing as much text as possible moving left to right. The display field members are changed, the glyph vector is not invalidated.
        Overrides:
        determineLeftwise in class TextField.DisplayableText
        Parameters:
        metrics - A FontMetrics object to measure text with

      • displayAll

        protected void displayAll()
        Set the field members to display all of the text currently in the field. (As asterisks, of course.)
        Overrides:
        displayAll in class TextField.DisplayableText
